name: Elbub
description:
Relaxing and simple short game about flying in abstract, peaceful environment.

Play as a bubble, follow the coloured tape to reach the main bubble.

Key Features:


  • Unique calming, peaceful game.
  • Abstract and colourful gaming environment.
  • Relaxing sound atmosphere.
  • Simple and intuitive gaming experience.
  • Alternative psychedelic display mode.
  • No stories, just flying and lots of bubbles!
